title: 2011-04-16 - Troj-Sasfis-O
plain_text:
# Troj/Sasfis-O

**[sophos.com/en-us/threat-center/threat-analyses/viruses-and-spyware/Troj~Sasfis-O/detailed-analysis.aspx](https://www.sophos.com/en-us/threat-center/threat-analyses/viruses-and-spyware/Troj~Sasfis-O/detailed-analysis.aspx)**

Examples of Troj/Sasfis-O include:

## Example 1

**File Information**

**Size**
5.2M

**SHA-1**
76738d71459a99818987317e388407ac60fda021

**MD5**
4c0d4ba52108e3ac243711ec8ab8f72e

**CRC-32**
f1fc15e8

**File type**
application/x-ms-dos-executable

**First seen**
2011-04-16

**Other vendor detection**

**Kaspersky**
Trojan.Win32.Sasfis.bhiw

**Runtime Analysis**

Copies Itself To

c:\Documents and Settings\test user\Local Settings\Application Data\usnscv.exe

Dropped Files


-----

2011-04-05
